snippet.title: UNO™ - PSP trailer by Gameloft
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE US + EUROPE on APRIL 22th 2010.
The world famous card game is faithfully reproduced for the PSP® system and also features exciting new rules. With a multiplayer mode played locally between up to 4 PSP® systems or on PlayStation®Network, UNO™ has never been so fun and easy, so be the first to get rid of all your cards!

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
